General.Name: Serve Robotics Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Serve Robotics Inc. designs, develops, and operates low-emission robots that serve people in public spaces for food delivery activity in the United States. It builds self-driving delivery robots. Serve Robotics Inc. was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Redwood City, California.
General.Address: 730 Broadway, Redwood City, CA, United States, 94063

3.Name: Ms. MJ Burk Chun
3.Title: Co-Founder and VP of Product & Design
